question: 1) Math – Short Answer Find an antiderivative with respect to x for the fraction with numerator e2x and denominator 1 + e4x.
answer:
½ arctan e2x (ACCEPT: ½ arctan e2x + C for any constant C)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
